visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Highcharts responsive chart'. The chart should display monthly sales data for a year, with axes labels styled in a specific way. The chart should also be responsive, adjusting its appearance when the width is less than or equal to 500 pixels. Additionally, provide buttons to resize the chart to specific dimensions.

subtitle.text: Resize the frame to see the axes change

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with a title 'Highcharts responsive chart' and a subtitle explaining the responsiveness of the chart. The x-axis displays months as categories, and the y-axis represents the number of items sold. Both axes have styled labels with specific colors and font sizes. The chart includes a single series named 'Sales' with monthly data. The chart is designed to be responsive, with adjustments made when the width is 500 pixels or less, such as abbreviating month names to their first letter and adjusting the y-axis labels. Additionally, the chart can be resized using buttons that trigger JavaScript functions to set the chart size to either 400x300 or 800x300 pixels.
